    public class District
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    The district class represent a district area on the London map.
    Author:
    Jacopo Madaluni 1737569
    See Also:

      • putInList

        public void putInList()
        This method should be called by the map on every districts once all the districts have been created and initialized. This method puts the district in the static list of distrcts in ascendent order, based on the number of bnbs that are in this one.
